fmmua.error.PowerNotFound: Character {actor} does not have a power named {power}.
fmmua.error.ItemIdNotFound: Character {actor} does not have an item with id {item}.
fmmua.error.ItemIsNotPower: This item is not a Power and cannot be used.
fmmua.error.ActorIsNotOwned: You don't own this character and can't use their powers.
fmmua.error.deleteTokens.NoGM: You can only delete tokens when a GM is logged in.
fmmua.error.deleteTokens.UntrustedUser: Untrusted player {name} attempted to delete tokens.
fmmua.error.deleteTokens.UnownedTokens: Player {name} attempted to delete unowned tokens.
fmmua.settings.actorsGroupPowersHint: Display role, class and other powers separately on character sheets.
fmmua.settings.glossaryChatLinksHint: Display help text for game concepts in chat messages.
